      • setup

        public static void setup(Context context,
                         java.lang.String cubeaconID,
                         java.lang.String cubeaconKey,
                         java.lang.String kiiAppID,
                         java.lang.String kiiAppKey,
                         java.lang.String kiiSite,
                         boolean CBShowBGAlert,
                         boolean CBShowFGAlert,
                         boolean CBShowAlertOnEnter,
                         boolean CBShowAlertOnExit,
                         java.lang.String CBDefaultAlertTitle,
                         java.lang.String CBDefaultAlertMsg)
        Method to initialize setup of Cubeacon SDK
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        cubeaconID - Cubeacon ID
        cubeaconKey - Cubeacon Key
        kiiAppID - Kii Application ID
        kiiAppKey - Kii Application Key
        kiiSite - Kii Site
        CBShowBGAlert - Show background alert status
        CBShowFGAlert - Show foreground alert status
        CBShowAlertOnEnter - Show alert onEnter event
        CBShowAlertOnExit - Show alert onExit event
        CBDefaultAlertTitle - Default alert title
        CBDefaultAlertMsg - Default alert message

      • setup

        public static void setup(Context context,
                         java.lang.String propertiesFile)
        Method to initialize setup of Cubeacon SDK
        Parameters:
        context - Context from Application Context
        propertiesFile - String name of Cubeacon properties file that saved on Java Source folder
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Exception for throwing error when Cubeacon properties file is not found or invalid

        public static void refreshBeaconInBackground(Context context,
                                             CB.RefreshBeaconCallback callback)
        Request/get the latest data from Cloud using non blocking thread
        Parameters:
        context - The context from activity
        callback - The callback function that called after refreshBeaconInBackground complete
